title: LiU PhD course: R for Environmental Chemistry Data Analysis
text:
Preface
This is the handbook for the PhD course on R for environmental chemistry data analysis


To learn more about Quarto books visit:

https://quarto.org/docs/books
https://r4ds.hadley.nz/quarto.html

Some usefule links to other R for data science books:

https://www.r4epi.com/installing-r-and-rstudio



library(tidyverse)

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

[1] 2






Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
